page.title: 17HEALTH CARE
page.content: The Health Centre provides many medical facilities.Several general practitioners are based there besides a chiropodist,speech therapist,dentist and school health visitor.Hightown Hospital,built in 1926 as a miner's convalescent hospital is now,after modernisation,mainly for geriatric patients.The outpatients dept. specialises in neurology physiotherapy and occupational therapy.The casualty dept.is limited, serious cases going to Pontefract. Castleford has 2 homes for aged persons besides bungalows and flats with wardens.Community care for old people is still strongly supported. The increasing sale of whole foods and use of health clubs shows how people are becoming more aware of self-care. The herbalist shop in the market is a reminder of traditional medicine.
